title: Fearful Day: Voices of Hell Prequel
description: Sometimes, in the darkness, there are things waiting for the most innocent souls. Things which seek out the goodness in its victims because it is the most precious thing they can destroy. The author of Stolen and Reborn of The Requiem of Humanity Series brings you into the recesses of a twisted mind in this tale of demons, shadows, and prophecies fulfilled.
author: Catherine Stovall
